document_api_meta.title: Partial Edit Responsible Person
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Edit the details of an EU responsible person in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop. Include the locale code to edit the responsible person's information in a particular language.
Target seller: Local sellers operating in EU countries
**Note**:
- Updates are handled per top-level property, so all non-empty fields within an updated object must be supplied to prevent overwriting with blanks.
- For top-level properties (e.g. `name`, `email`) that are not nested in an object, you can update them individually. Omitting these properties in the request will leave them unchanged.
- If you need to edit any nested property within an object, you must provide values for all nested properties of that object. Any omitted nested properties will be overwritten with blanks. For example, if you want to update `phone_number.local_number`, you must also include the `country_code` property to avoid data loss for that property.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_body_param.name: name
request_body_param.desc:
The responsible person name.
Max length: 200 characters

request_body_param.name: email
request_body_param.desc: The email address of the responsible person.

request_body_param.name: phone_number
request_body_param.desc: The phone number of the responsible person.

request_body_param.name: ^country_code
request_body_param.desc:
The country code of the phone number, prefixed by a plus `+` symbol. E.g. +353 for Ireland. Only EU country codes are allowed.
Max digits: 4

request_body_param.name: address
request_body_param.desc: The residential address of the responsible person.

request_body_param.name: ^street_address_line1
request_body_param.desc:
The detailed street address of the location, including the building number, street name, district, city, province, and any relevant details.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^street_address_line2
request_body_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. If provided, its value will be merged into `street_address_line1`. It is recommended to specify `street_address_line1` directly.)
An optional secondary line for additional address details, if necessary.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^district
request_body_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. If provided, its value will be merged into `street_address_line1`. It is recommended to specify `street_address_line1` directly.)
The district name.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^city
request_body_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. If provided, its value will be merged into `street_address_line1`. It is recommended to specify `street_address_line1` directly.)
The city name.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^postal_code
request_body_param.desc:
The postal code.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^province
request_body_param.desc:
(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future API version. If provided, its value will be merged into `street_address_line1`. It is recommended to specify `street_address_line1` directly.)
The province, state, or region name.
Max length: 500 characters

request_body_param.name: ^country
request_body_param.desc: The two letter ISO 3166 country code representing the country of the address. It must be an EU country.

request_body_param.name: locale
request_body_param.desc:
The BCP-47 locale code representing the language used for specifying the responsible person information.
Possible values:
- de-DE
- en-IE
- es-ES
- fr-FR
- it-IT
Default: The locale of the seller's registered business address.

**Note**: The information provided will be automatically translated into all EU languages supported by TikTok Shop. Ensure the locale matches the language used in field values to avoid inaccurate translations.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

error_code_list.msg: Operation is not supported for global seller
Seller is not authorised to access resource

document_api_meta.request_body: {"name":"John Doe","email":"john.doe@email.com","phone_number":{"country_code":"+353","local_number":"80915151"},"address":{"street_address_line1":"63 Cardiff Ln, Grand Canal Dock, Dublin City, Dublin","street_address_line2":"-","district":"-","city":"-","postal_code":"D02 HD23","province":"-","country":"IE"},"locale":"en-IE"}

sample_code.label: Curl
sample_code.value:
curl -X POST \
 'https://open-api.tiktokglobalshop.com/product/202409/compliance/responsible_persons/66d3cbe4d9c8b09ddca023f1/partial_edit?timestamp=1623812664&app_key=38abcd&sign=5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-H 'x-tts-access-token: TTP_pwSm2AAAAABmmtFz1xlyKMnwg74T2GJ5s0uQbS8jPjb_GkdFVCxPqzQXSyuyfXdQa0AqyDsea2tYFNVf4XeqgZHFfPyv0Vs659QqyLYfsGzanZ5XZAin3_ZkcIxxS0_In6u6XDeU96k' \
-d '{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@email.com",
  "phone_number": {
    "country_code": "+353",
    "local_number": "80915151"
  },
  "address": {
    "street_address_line1": "63 Cardiff Ln, Grand Canal Dock, Dublin City, Dublin",
    "street_address_line2": "-",
    "district": "-",
    "city": "-",
    "postal_code": "D02 HD23",
    "province": "-",
    "country": "IE"
  },
  "locale": "en-IE"
}'

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ProductV202409API.Product202409ComplianceResponsiblePersonsResponsiblePersonIdPartialEditPost(context.Background(), "66d3cbe4d9c8b09ddca023f1")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody := product_v202409.NewProduct202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody()
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody.SetName("John Doe")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody.SetEmail("john.doe@email.com")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyPhoneNumber := product_v202409.NewProduct202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyPhoneNumber()
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyPhoneNumber.SetCountryCode("+353")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyPhoneNumber.SetLocalNumber("80915151")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody.SetPhoneNumber(*product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyPhoneNumber)
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress := product_v202409.NewProduct202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress()
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetStreetAddressLine1("63 Cardiff Ln, Grand Canal Dock, Dublin City, Dublin")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetStreetAddressLine2("-")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetDistrict("-")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetCity("-")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetPostalCode("D02 HD23")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetProvince("-")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress.SetCountry("IE")
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody.SetAddress(*product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBodyAddress)
    product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody.SetLocale("en-IE")
    request = request.Product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody(*product202409PartialEditResponsiblePersonRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to sync your product information to TikTok Shop(s). For products available in the EU markets, this also includes the information of the Responsible Persons and Manufacturer.

request_path_param.name: responsible_person_id
request_path_param.desc: The responsible person ID in TikTok Shop.
